Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.android.conversion_showdown

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationTest
    Testing Fundamentals
    baseCalculator
    Created by Jordan Ang on 11/20/2016. Modified by Claudia Zeng and Kerry Mo on 02/25/2018. An activity class where the user can add/subtract/multiply/divide two different based numbers and get a result in bin/dec/hex/oct. It will catch the exceptions when user inputs a number which is too large or has wrong format.
    baseCalculatorTest
    Created by irenepatt on 11/21/16. Modified by Claudia Zeng and Kerry Mo on 02/25/2018. This class contains JUnit test cases for the baseCalculator activity. Each test feeds the two inputs with numbers in specific bases, and gives operation as well as the desired result base, then checks if the baseCalculator gives an answer that is the same as the expected answer. Run the test simply by right clicking the test in Project display and select “Run ‘baseCalculatorTest’”, then just wait for the test result.
    BuildConfig  
    Converter
    Created by UMARU on 7/27/2016. This class deals with conversion between bases in application. It checkes the validity of the request to change its base. If it's invalid, it throws the exception IntOverFlow or SanityCheckException. It also contains the methods to convert decimal numbers to specific base string including Hex/Bin/Oct.
    ConverterActivity
    Activity class for converting Created by UMARU 7/26/2016.
    ConverterFragment
    This is a fragment class taking in charge of converting in the application Created by UMARU on 7/27/2016.
    decBinTutorial =======  
    This is a tutorial page for learning conversion between decimal numbers and binary numbers.
    hexDecTutorial =======  
    This is a tutorial for learning converison between hexadecimal numbers and decimal numbers.
    Introduction
    Introduction page after Splash Screen and Welcome
    MyUtils
    Checks appropriate input.
    =======
    Checks appropriate input Created by UMARU on 7/15/2016. Modified sanity_check methods by Claudia Zeng and Kerry Mo on 02/25/2018. It will throw SanityCheckException when users give wrong input format.
    Question
    Class that deals with type of questions Created by UMARU on 7/26/2016.
    Quiz
    Class that deals with the Quiz you can customize in Quiz Selection KEY 1. Decimal to Binary conversion 2. Binary to Decimal conversion 3. Decimal to Octal conversion 4. Octal to Decimal conversion 5. Binary to Octal conversion 6. Octal to Binary conversion 7. Decimal to Hexadecimal conversion 8. Hexadecimal to Decimal conversion 9. Binary to Hexadecimal conversion 10. Hexadecimal to Binary conversion 11. Octal to Hexadecimal conversion 12. Hexadecimal to Octal conversion
    QuizSelection
    Page where you customize your own quiz

    ScoreReport
    The report of score at the end of taking Quiz

    Created by UMARU on 7/27/2016.
    SwiperCalculatorActivity.CustomAdapter  
    TestActivity1
    Created by UMARU on 7/26/2016.
    TestActivity2
    Created by UMARU on 7/26/2016.
    Tutorial
    It will bring up a new activity where contains several conversion tutorial documentations when users click "Tutorial" on the main page.
    =======     		 
    It will bring up a new activity where contains several conversion tutorial documentations when users click "Tutorial" on the main page. Created by Claudia Zeng and Kerry Mo on 02/25/2018
    Welcome
    Welcome screen with ENTER button
